text: Gonna be a tense 48 hours in the Senate. GOP leaders are plowing ahead.  Rs more upbeat about Kavanaugh then they were at lunchtime today. Judiciary Committee to meet and vote less than 13 hours from now. Uncertainty about Murkowski/Collins/Flake looms over everything.

text:

Asked if he had the votes and if he thought Kavanaugh would be confirmed, McConnell did not respond.
author: WaPoSean

text:
Bottom line on the Senate Republicans tonight: they are full steam ahead on a vote on Kavanaugh in the Judiciary Committee tomorrow and holding a procedural vote on Sat.
